title: Drawing, "Plant Studies from the Rio Magdalena, Colombia", 1853, probably May
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper right:  Running Water; again, at lower left: palm; and again, at center right:  Reddish ochre / stony earth
description: Horizontal view of a palm at left and two designs of hanging boughs at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Plant Studies from the Rio Magdalena, Colombia", 1853, probably May.
1853, probably May. Graphite on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-847.
